channel.title: Apprehension: Scientist doesn´t talk...
channel.description: The scientist in the room in which you find the crossbow doesn´t say a word. I suspect it is because I killed the water creature before getting to him.

item.title: Apprehension: Scientist doesn´t talk...
item.dc:creator: Dr_Maxwell
item.description:
Yeah, he should def. have some alternate dialogue if you killed it before coming up to him. Maybe an achievement, too, although the developers might be irritated at the prospect of adding a new achievement, even if some of the achievements in the final game are “die in an embarrassing way”.

Read full topic
